definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: he1 liang2 shui3 dou1 sai1 ya2

sentences.english: cold waters to a thirsty soul, so [is] good news from a far country.
sentences.chinese: 有好消息從遠方來，就如拿涼水給口渴的人喝。

sentences.english: An immediate cold water souse may remove the black spot from your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 立即放在涼水裏浸泡可能會去掉襯衫上的黑點。

sentences.english: Wash the rice in cold water until the water runs clear.
sentences.chinese: 用涼水沖洗大米，直到水變清爲止。

sentences.english: Wash with cold water. This will prevent shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 用涼水清洗，以免羽絨服縮水。

sentences.english: Rinse with cold water; then dry in the sun.
Cool water enters the pipes at one end of the panel.
sentences.chinese: 涼水進入到太陽能集熱板底部的管子。

sentences.english: She bathed in cold water winter and summer.
sentences.chinese: 不論寒暑她都用涼水洗澡。

sentences.english: Delay flat hot heart like poured a pot of cold water, very disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 延平火熱的心就像澆了一盆涼水，失望之極。

sentences.english: I tricked my brother yesterday by putting some cold water in his shoes!
sentences.chinese: 我昨天捉弄了我的哥哥一頓，把涼水放進了他的鞋裏。

sentences.english: Finish up with a cold-water rinse.
sentences.chinese: 浸透頭髮，最後用涼水沖洗乾淨。

sentences.english: Take out and spray some water on it and let cool completely.
sentences.chinese: 然後在麪包表面噴灑涼水，架上晾涼。

sentences.english: He thirsted for a drink of cold water.
As cold waters to a thirsty soul, so is good news from a far country.
sentences.chinese: 有好消息從遠方來，就如拿涼水給口渴的人喝。

sentences.english: Can I have some cold water, please?

definition: Yanshui town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
